page.title: 15NEW ROADS
page.content: One of the major road changes in recent years has been the construction of the dual_carrage A27 unfortunately it rverts to a two lane road where it meets the A29 at fontwell race corse. At peak times in the summer this causes long traffic delays. A by_pass of the junction has been mooted for many years, but a major problem is the crossing of the national trust woods at slidon. by 1985 the plans are there for a by_pass , with a roundeabout to join the A29 and A27 , but construction has not yet begun.
